name: BLU and the Fireflies
description:
Hello! 

I made this game for a class in my Game Development Course based on Celeste mechanics, but with a twist, you cannot perform double jumps ou dash everytime... Let the fireflies help you with this!

This is a prototype!

Buttons:

Movement:  Left Arrow, Upper Arrow and Right Arrow.

Dash (when available): C

Double Jump (when available): X

Thx for trying this game.

GLHF! <3
